i m not going to go the extra mile anymore.

content.text: Hey there. I'm having a rough day. What's your best memory?
My best memory is when I went to the Amazon rainforest when I was younger. It was so amazing! The trees were so tall and the animals were so unique. I even saw a sloth!
That sounds awesome! I've never been to the Amazon rainforest. I've always wanted to go.
You should! It's an incredible place.
I wish I could. My back is really bad from years of standing on my feet all day. I don't think I could handle the long hikes.
Oh that's too bad. But you could always take a boat ride!
That's true. I could always do that.
So what's been making your day so rough?
Well, my dad died a few years ago and I'm still not over it. And I'm not sure if my mom would approve of my dream to go to Mars.
I'm so sorry to hear about your dad. I can't imagine how hard that must have been. And I'm sure your mom would be proud of you, no matter what you do.
So what's your dream to go to Mars?
I've always been fascinated by space. And I think it would be amazing to be one of the first people to set foot on Mars.
That would be amazing! I'd love to go to Mars one day too.
So what do you think your dad would think of your dream to go to Mars?
I think he'd be proud of me for following my dreams
